trans-unit.source: Provides methods and properties for all activity designers that display parallel vertical layouts on a workflow design surface.
An activity designer that displays a parallel vertical layout represents an activity on the workflow design surface that has two code paths that a workflow can follow.
trans-unit.target: 顯示平行垂直配置的活動設計工具，表示在工作流程設計介面中擁有兩個程式碼路徑可供工作流程遵循的活動。

trans-unit.source: For example, the designer used for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> activity displays the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> activity on the workflow design surface and has a parallel vertical layout.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> 活動所使用的設計工具會在工作流程設計介面上顯示 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> 活動並擁有平行垂直配置。

trans-unit.source: Each branch of the parallel layout visually represents an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> activity contained in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: 每個平行配置的分支會以視覺方式表示 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> 活動中所包含的 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> 活動。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> class.
The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> that describes the location to move the activities to.
The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> read-only collection that contains the activities to move.
Returns a value that indicates whether child activities of the activity associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> can be moved.
<see langword="true" /> if the activities can be moved from the parent activity; otherwise <see langword="false" />.

The following example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.CanMoveActivities%2A> method to allow the moving of child activities within the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範如何覆寫 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.CanMoveActivities%2A> 方法，以允許移動 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> 內的子活動。

trans-unit.source: The read-only collection of activities to remove.
Returns a value that indicates whether child activities of the activity associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> can be deleted.
<see langword="true" /> if the activities can be deleted from the parent activity; otherwise <see langword="false" />.

The following example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.CanRemoveActivities%2A> method to allow the moving of child activities within the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範如何覆寫 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.CanRemoveActivities%2A> 方法，以允許移動 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> 內的子活動。

trans-unit.source: Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the first selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，設計工具巡覽順序中的第一個可選取物件。

trans-unit.source: If the designer's <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> property or the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> property is set to `false`, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> returns a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 如果設計工具的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> 屬性或 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> 屬性設為 `false`，<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> 會傳回 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> property count is greater than 0, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associated with the first activity designer in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> 屬性計數大於 0，<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> 會傳回與集合中第一個活動設計工具關聯的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that defines the x- and y-coordinates for the drop target.
Returns array of rectangles that represent the valid drop locations within the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> array that represents the valid drop locations within the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
The current <see cref="T:System.Object" /> in the navigation order.
A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection" /> enumeration value that determines the navigation order of the designer.
Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that follows the specified object.
Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，設計工具巡覽順序中的最後一個可選取物件。

trans-unit.source: If the designer's <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> property is set to `false`, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> returns a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 如果設計工具的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> 或 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> 屬性設為 `false`，<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> 會傳回 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> contains child activity designers, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> returns the last selectable object associated with the first child activity designer.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> 包含子活動設計工具，<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> 會傳回與第一個子活動設計工具關聯的最後一個可選取物件。

trans-unit.source: If the child activity designer is collapsed, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associated with the first activity designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果子活動設計工具是摺疊的，<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> 會傳回 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> 集合中與第一個活動設計工具關聯的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the user has created a new branch activity on the activity associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.

The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> that was added as the new branch of the activity associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the layout arguments.
Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
<paramref name="e" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the layout arguments.
Sets the size of the visual cues on the designers contained within the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that contains the new size settings for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> that contains the drawing arguments.
Draws the visual representation of the activity associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> at design time.
Gets the collection of designer verbs to be associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.

An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerbCollection" /> that contains the designer verbs to associate with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerbCollection" />，包含要與 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> 關聯的設計工具動詞。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.Verbs%2A> property determines the commands that are displayed on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> context menu.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.Verbs%2A> 屬性可決定要在 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> 內容功能表上顯示的命令。

trans-unit.source: The verb collection includes any designer verbs <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> inherits from the designer classes it extends.
trans-unit.target: 動詞集合包含任何的設計工具動詞，<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> 會從延伸的設計工具類別繼承這些動詞。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.Verbs%2A> property to insert custom verb actions for a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範如何覆寫 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.Verbs%2A> 屬性，以便插入 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> 的自訂動詞動作。

trans-unit.source: The `CreateActivityVerbs` creates a new <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb> named `"Add New Parallel Branch"` and associates an event handler named `OnAddParallelBranch`.
trans-unit.target: `CreateActivityVerbs` 會建立名稱為 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb> 的新 `"Add New Parallel Branch"`，並與名稱為 `OnAddParallelBranch` 的事件處理常式產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: When the verb is clicked in the workflow designer, the event handler is called.
trans-unit.target: 在工作流程設計工具中按一下此動詞時，會呼叫事件處理常式。
